author: jwaldman
msg: TRINIDAD-2066 do not cache url connections for trinidad-skins.xml or for skinning's css files in design time mode

author: veithen
msg: AXIOM-353: Also integrated SAXOMBuilder into the OMXMLParserWrapper/OMXMLBuilderFactory/OMMetaFactory API. This will allow alternative implementations of the Axiom API to do extra optimizations that will benefit e.g. to the XmlBeans databinding in Axis2.
